tool_description: Extracts and standardizes basic identifying information about an artwork from various input formats to establish a foundation for provenance research.

artwork_title.description: The title or name of the artwork

artist_name.description: The name of the artist who created the work

creation_date.description: Approximate date or date range when the artwork was created

medium.description: The medium or materials used (oil on canvas, bronze, etc.)

error_messages: Invalid artist name: Artist name cannot be empty or contain only special characters.
Invalid artwork title: Artwork title cannot be empty or contain only special characters.
Invalid date format: Use standard date formats like YYYY, YYYY-MM-DD, or descriptive ranges like 'circa 1850'.
usage: Provide the basic identifying information about an artwork. The tool standardizes and validates this information for use in subsequent provenance research tools.

normalized_date.description: Normalized creation date or date range

metadata_confidence.description: Confidence score for the metadata quality (0-100)

alternative_titles.description: Known alternative titles for the artwork
